name: Easy Italian Sausage Spaghetti
author: jenmannaz
summary: The flavor of spaghetti and meatballs, without the hassle of making meatballs!
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
1 teaspoon dried oregano, or to taste
1 teaspoon dried basil, or to taste
1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti, or as needed
¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir sausage, mushrooms, onion, green bell pepper, and garlic in the hot oil until sausage is browned and crumbly, about 20 minutes; drain and discard grease
Stir tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and olives into sausage mixture; season with oregano, basil, and salt
Simmer mixture until flavors infuse, about 30 minutes
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Drain and transfer to a serving bowl; top with tomato-sausage sauce and Parmesan cheese
